alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 7:01PM MST until February 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 to 30 below zero with isolated colder wind chills possible. * WHERE...Rawlins, Saratoga, Elk Mountain, Laramie, Douglas, Lusk, Chadron, Alliance and Hemingford. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 to 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
